content:
You're hard at work on the Ecoglobe, aren't you?
Please take this <color=#8AAB4B>{稀有虫蝴蝶}</color>,
It's just a small token of appreciation that I hope will assist you.
info: 送生物-幻雪_主流程文本2

content: Whenever I see a butterfly, my feet move of their own accord and I feel compelled to follow it, watching its fluttering wings trace elegant arcs through the air.
info: 送生物-幻雪_主流程文本2

content: I've been watching, and I've noticed on several occasions that butterflies and little insects just seem to fall right into your insect net!
info: 送生物-幻雪_主流程文本2
